meta_data.description: 1500 Sq. Ft. - Rent 3 BHK Apartment / Flat in ATS Greens Village, Sector 93 A Noida * 9 Property & locality photos * Semifurnished * - 5th floor (out of 10). View contact number for free. Click for complete details on 99acres.com

structured_data.description: A spacious 3 bhk flat for rent is available in sector 93 a noida in ats greens village, noida. This property is close to metro station, close to school, close to hospital and close to market. Property has attached 3 bathrooms & 3 balconies with 3 rooms set in 1400 sq.Ft. Carpet area. The flat consists of 3 bedrooms, built on 1500 sq.Ft. Society provides 1 covered parking with this flat & the option for 1 open parking is also available. The building has a total of 10 floors and this property is situated on 5th floor. Property is 5-10 years old. Semi-Furnished flat with 15 light, 5 fan, 3 wardrobe, 3 geyser, 1 modular kitchen, 1 chimney and 1 exhaust fan. The flat will be available from wed, 29 oct 2025 for families, single men and single women on any agreement type with a notice of 1 month for a duration of 11 months. We are demanding  45,000 for this unmatched property. Refundable security deposit of  90000 to be paid for finalising the option. You will also get all modern property feature like reserved parking, power back-Up, water storage, security / fire alarm, feng shui / vaastu compliant, intercom facility, high ceiling height, false ceiling lighting, piped-Gas, internet/wi-Fi connectivity, centrally air conditioned, water purifier, recently renovated, private garden / terrace, natural light, airy rooms and spacious interiors. This place is equipped with quality features like swimming pool, fitness centre / gym, club house / community center, park, shopping centre, cctv surveillance, lift(s), visitor parking, maintenance staff, water softening plant and security personnel. Additional things included here are separate entry for servant room, waste disposal, no open drainage around, rain water harvesting, bank attached property, low density society, corner property, pet friendly, wheelchair friendly and in a gated society. Power backup: Full. The flat is east facing. The flat has vitrified flooring.
